original_text: And he walked in the way of the kings of Israel, as the house of Ahab had done, for the daughter of Ahab was his wife. And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord.
korean_text: 그가 이스라엘 왕들의 길을 가서 아합의 집과 같이 하였으니 이는 아합의 딸이 그의 아내가 되었음이라 그가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: And he walked in the way of the kings of Israel
as the house of Ahab had done
for the daughter of Ahab was his wife
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 아합의 딸이 그의 아내였기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와 보시기에 악한 일을 행했습니다
